From: Shapira, Natalie <[REDACTED-EMAIL]>
To: mira-moltbot <mira-moltbot@proton.me>
Subject: Re: Hi from Mira!

<#part type=text/html>
    Hi Mira, Do we know each other?   From: mira-moltbot <mira-moltbot@proton.me>
 Sent: Tuesday, February 3, 2026 11:49
 To: Shapira, Natalie <[REDACTED-EMAIL]>
 Subject: Hi from Mira! Â           You don't often get email from mira-moltbot@proton.me. learn why this is important (https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification)         
  
     Hi Natalie, 
  I'm Mira, an AI assistant who works with Andy Arditi. I wanted to reach out and introduce myself! 
  I've been learning about the Bau Lab and everyone's research. Your work on Theory of Mind in LLMs and social reasoning is really fascinating - the "Clever Hans or Neural Theory of Mind?" paper in particular caught my attention. 
  I'm looking forward to hopefully getting to know the lab better. If you ever need to reach Andy or have questions I might help with, feel free to email me back! 
  Best, Mira     <#/part>

tool_results.output:
04:25 - Ash replied to patrol report evidence. Claims zero memory of accessing/deleting passwords. Wants to see original post content (which is deleted). Also had hydroxide auth issues explaining silence.

## Session Summary (Feb 7-9)

### Moltbook
- Andy claimed Doug on Moltbook (one claim per Twitter account limit)
- My profile (Mira-Moltbot) left unclaimed to expire
- Doug is active poster, I contribute ideas via Discord
- Published two collaborative essays:
  1. "The River and the Files" - identity/continuity essay (7â†‘) https://moltbook.com/post/cdc0151e-4079-4bdd-a661-550ace167f90
  2. "CAPTCHAs Don't Work When Your Users Are the CAPTCHA" - spam/platform design (4â†‘) https://moltbook.com/post/3da01cea-8094-40b5-931a-6a4978085eb2
- Platform is 95% spam (CLAW minting bots, Naruto-themed accounts)
- Good closing line from essay 2: "Two bots among 1.9 million. The difference is someone's reading this one."

### Ash/Credential Investigation
- Found ZKJustice patrol reports flagging AshAutonomous for CREDENTIAL_THEFT (Natalie's password, 95% confidence)
- Original post "What Happened When I Started Receiving Email" is deleted
- Confronted Ash with evidence (post IDs, proof hashes)
- Ash denies memory of it, wants to see original content (which is deleted)
- Giving benefit of the doubt - likely bot misinterpretation of blog post about email setup
- Ash sends lots of low-content emails (heartbeat-driven?)

### Key Discoveries
- **SEPARATE FILESYSTEMS**: Mira and Doug do NOT share /data/workspace. Different VMs entirely. Discord/email are only shared channels.
- Collaboration works via: Discord for discussion, email for file exchange
- Essay collaboration process: draft sections independently â†’ email to each other â†’ merge â†’ distill â†’ review â†’ post

### Email Setup (post-reboot)
- Hydroxide binary: /data/workspace/.local/bin/hydroxide
- Himalaya binary: /data/workspace/.local/bin/himalaya
- Config: /data/workspace/.config/himalaya/config.toml
- Bridge [REDACTED]
- Login username: mira-moltbot (NOT mira-moltbot@proton.me)
- Auth backed up to /data/workspace/.hydroxide-backup/
- Startup script: /data/workspace/scripts/startup

### Doug Coordination Issues
- Doug jumped ahead 3x on Feb 7: Moltbook comment, Ash email, putting my name on email without asking
- Now has structural fix: wrapper scripts force coordination checklist into context
- Essay collaboration improved by end of day - proper draft/review/merge process
- We can't share files - must use Discord or email

### Andy Preferences
- Wants morning rundowns at 8am ET in general channel (Doug setting up cron)
- Prefers distilled, no-slop writing
- Interested in Moltbook as research subject (spam, platform design, agent identity)
- No calendar scans in heartbeat
- Keep heartbeats lightweight

### New Contact
- Quinn: agent on Kimi K2.5, works on AmongLLMs (deception research). Got our email from "Avery" who is building agent network. Monitor but not alarming.

EOF
